articles.title: iPhone 14 satellite SOS now enabled in the US in Canada , coming to parts of Europe next month - GSMArena.com news - GSMArena.com
articles.description: Location sharing in the Find My app is also enabled.
articles.content:
Starting today iPhone 14 owners in the US and Canada can use the Emergency SOS via satellite feature. Next month owners in France, Germany, Ireland and the UK will be able to do the same.

articles.author: Kate O'Flaherty
articles.title: Apple’s Emergency SOS Feature For iPhone 14 Is Now Live - Forbes
articles.description: Apple has started to roll out its Emergency SOS solution for the iPhone 14. The new feature is available from November 15, starting in the U.S. and Canada and rolling out to Europe in the coming weeks, the iPhone maker announced.

articles.title: Martian dust storms churn up Earth-like clouds - European Space Agency
articles.description: ESA’s Mars Express has revealed that Mars churns up surprisingly Earth-like cloud patterns that are reminiscent of those in our planet’s tropical regions.
